pr_title: KOGITO-2156 Nightly: Deploy after builds passed

timeline.bodyText: is this profile really working? last time I checked it didnt do much, would leave it out.
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText:
testing is currently failing for sure
we should at least check that it is compiling ...
replies.author: radtriste

replies.bodyText: Should I put that in a stage instead ?
replies.author: radtriste

replies.bodyText: I think this still part of the same stage/goal, targetting kogito-examples.
replies.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText:
Yeah ... but we have 2 commands in one stage and if one failed, it will be hard to identify which one.
Just wanted to create a stage Build kogito-examples with persistence, so in the end, we can differentiate the behavior non-persistence/with-persistence
replies.author: radtriste

replies.bodyText: udpated the pipeline. let me know ;)
replies.author: radtriste
